html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-08162012-06-19,  ,  ,  NR,  CRA, 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectInvestors in the Norbourg and Evolution Funds Remission Order
PrecisREMISSION ORDER of an amount not exceeding $256,000, which amount is equal to the estimated dividend bankruptcy payment in respect of tax payable by Vincent Lacroix, a bankrupt person, for the 2005 taxation year. The remission and waiver are subject to conditions that, if met, will permit the distribution of the amount to investors in the Norbourg and Evolution funds as partial settlement of funds misappropriated by the tax debtor Vincent Lacroix.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2012-0043 Publication Date: 2012-07-04
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Investors in the Norbourg and Evolution Funds Remission Order
precis: REMISSION ORDER of an amount not exceeding $256,000, which amount is equal to the estimated dividend bankruptcy payment in respect of tax payable by Vincent Lacroix, a bankrupt person, for the 2005 taxation year.  The remission and waiver are subject to conditions that, if met, will permit the distribution of the amount to investors in the Norbourg and Evolution funds as partial settlement of funds misappropriated by the tax debtor Vincent Lacroix.
